name: Aspen: Last Stand
description:
Made amidst great inconveniences for My First Game Jam Winter 2022.

Defeat monsters to gain SUNLIGHT. When you die, spend SUNLIGHT to increase BARK (health) or BLADE (damage) before you restart. When you gain enough SUNLIGHT, you can finish the game.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • X or J to attack
  • Z or K to dodge

Notes:

Well, it's a long way from what I had hoped, but it's a thing. Sort of.
